attributes.action: Make stuff accessible for tall people
attributes.additional_details: I am 6ft 7in and there is certain things in day to day life that are difficult for example walking through doors having to duck down, the seat not going low enough in a photo booth, not being able to go to a theme park as most of there rides have a height restriction of 6ft 3in, Finding clothes that are the right length we make stuff accessible for people in wheel chairs, tall people face trouble in there day to day life,
